title: Bubble Plopper
description: In Bubble Plopper you can either try to prevent the bubbles from filling the playfield in Classic mode or try to clear the playfield within the given time in Time attack mode. Shooting bubbles has never been so fun. Plop plop!

title: Cryptogram: Word Brain Puzzle
description: Cryptogram: Word Brain Puzzle presents a fresh take on the classic word puzzle genre. With an array of unique gameplay mechanics, hints, and events, players are immersed in an engaging experience. The game's USP is its diverse content, offering a wide range of quotes across various themes, from inspirational to literary and beyond.

title: Sailor Chic vs Pirate Charm
description: Welcome to the trendy sea adventure! Two charming heroines are waiting for you in game: the humble little mermaid Amelie and the brave pirate princess Jacqueline. Amelie is the epitome of maritime glamour. Her style is white dresses, gold jewelry and wind in her hair. Jacqueline is the real pirate queen. She wears leather jackets, spectacular corsets and accessories with pirate symbols. Who will win in this fashionable battle - a sophisticated beauty or a daring sea robber? The choice is yours!

title: Brainrot Clicker
description:
Brainrot Clicker is a hilarious and chaotic idle clicker game that plunges you into a bizarre world of meme-fueled madness. Your mission is simple: tap the screen to earn “Italian Brainrot Points” and unlock increasingly ridiculous AI-generated characters from the internet’s wildest corners.

With eye-catching visuals, meme-inspired humor, and endless upgrades, Brainrot Clicker offers a weirdly satisfying experience you won’t want to stop!

title: Hazel Tangle Rope 3D: Sorting Puzzle
description: Untangle colorful twisted ropes in this satisfying 3D brain-teaser puzzle game. Strategically select and move rope endpoints to separate tangled knots and sort them by color. Use logical thinking and spatial reasoning to solve increasingly complex rope puzzles and become a tangle master.

title: Dream Mania Happy Match
description: Ready to begin a fantastic match-3 puzzle adventure? Dream Mania - Happy Match is a fun puzzle game that you won't be able to stop playing. It's easy to play, yet the challenging level design. It's a casual game you don't want to miss! Match 3 or more identical items to clear the board and hit your level goals.

title: Beach Club
description:
Calm down and manage your Beach Club!
Relax while listening to the waves, the ocean and some gulls. And soon you'll feel like you're floating around at the beach...
Let your helpers do all the work, stroll through the sand and collect the money from your customers.
Unlock new stuff so that even more people will come to your beach :D

Buy more seats, expand your beach and build your own empire!
Get some clean towels and make your Beach Club the most beautiful place.

title: SHOT CAN WILD
description: Keep tapping to shoot and prevent the can from falling! The game ends when you run out of ammo. Hit the center of te target for a COOL SHOT! Chain COOL SHOT to restore ammo!

title: Barbee Met Gala Transformation
description: Barbee and her friends have a big night ahead—the Met Gala! It’s your job to help each of them get dressed up and feel amazing. Whether someone’s into bold colors or classic glam, you get to style their look from head to toe and make sure they’re ready to walk the red carpet.

title: Grand Mahjong
description: Grand Mahjong is a captivating multi-level puzzle game based on the traditional Chinese Mahjong. Match identical tiles, clear the pyramid, and progress through increasingly challenging levels. This game is perfect for fans of logic games, brain puzzles, and anyone searching for a fun free Mahjong online experience.

title: Isometric Escape
description: Isometric is an escape game where you solve a series of puzzles to escape from isometric rooms. Find all the useful objects and use your logic and memory to solve the riddles.

title: Billiards 3D: Russian Pyramid
description: Play a realistic online billiards game against virtual opponents of varying difficulty. Customize AI skill levels to match your ability and improve your game. Enjoy lifelike tables of different sizes and refine your strategy in this immersive billiards experience!

title: Sum Master
description: Sum Master is an engaging and challenging number puzzle game designed to enhance your mental arithmetic and logical reasoning skills. The objective is to select numbers within a grid so that the sums of each row, column, and colored region match the specified targets. Each puzzle has a unique solution, requiring players to carefully consider which numbers to include or exclude. The game offers a stimulating experience that combines fun with educational value.

title: Word Search with hints
description: Search for hidden words on the letter grid. Use hints to solve words and improve your skills. This game is great for players of all ages, and it's a fun way to spend time and test mental abilities!

title: Emergency Operator
description: In Emergency Operator, you take charge of urgent 911 calls. Understand the caller's situation and decide whether to send the fire crew, police, medical team — or if no help is needed at all. Make the right calls to save lives, avoid false alarms, and keep the city safe. Prove your skills with accurate decisions and get promoted to higher ranks. Every decision counts!

title: Agent Hunt: Spy Shooter Game
description: Step into the role of an elite hitman in this tactical first-person shooter. Complete covert missions with precision shooting, stealth infiltration, and strategic planning. Use advanced sniper weapons to eliminate targets across diverse environments from cities to enemy hideouts in this action-packed spy thriller.

title: Addiction Mini Solitaire
description: Mini version of Addiction Solitaire. Use empty spots to arrange all cards in color and in sequence from A to 6. You can move a card to a gap if it is the same color and 1 higher in value than the card to the left of the gap. You have 1 reshuffle. After the Ace you need to place a 2 and then ascending to 6.

title: Dead Zone Mech Ops
description:
Dead Zone: Mech Ops thrusts players into the heart of a scorched Earth ravaged by endless war, where autonomous factions and rogue AI compete for control over the planet’s last remaining strongholds. You are a combat pilot in the elite “Mech Ops” unit — the final line of defense in a world on the brink of total collapse.
Players will command next-gen combat exosuits equipped with modular weapon systems, advanced targeting tech, and adaptive armor that reacts to battlefield conditions.

title: Stickman battle 1-4 Players
description:
Cool collection of dynamic action games!

Fight with rotating weapons, score goals in football, Take first place in a long race, Complete difficult survival levels and much more.

There is a quick round for a couple of minutes and a tournament for several rounds.

You can play up to 4 players, play with friends and bots.
You can change the player's appearance: change cars, faces, color.

Play and have a lot of fun!

title: Hide and Luig
description: Hide and Luig is a whimsical point-and-click hide-and-seek adventure where your only goal is to find the ever-elusive Luig—who insists on hiding inside the weirdest objects imaginable.

title: Tung Tung Sagur: Clicker
description: A hilarious clicker game featuring meme characters like Asasino Capuccino, Crocodilo Bombardiro, and more. Tap, upgrade, and gather gold in the world of Tralalelo!

title: FPS Toy Realism
description: This new shooter offers a unique experience of team battles on a large 12x12 map. Thanks to the excellent shooting feel and precise shooting mechanics, every shot feels realistic and exciting. The game features a weapon purchasing system similar to popular shooters, allowing you to select and customize your arsenal before the fight for maximum effectiveness. Support items such as medkits and rockets are available to help you quickly restore health or destroy enemies with powerful rocket volleys.

title: Fashion Week 2025
description: Get ready to rule the runway in Fashion Week 2025! Style 5 stunning models in high-fashion looks for the most glamorous fashion event of the year! From Chanel-inspired elegance to punk rock rebellion, create jaw-dropping outfits across five unique themes. Mix and match couture dresses, bold accessories, and trendy hairstyles to make every model shine! Are you ready to become the ultimate fashion stylist? Play now and slay the runway!

title: Italian Brainrot Clicker
description: Italian Brainrot Clicker is a hilarious one-button idle clicker that throws you into the chaotic charm of the Italian Brainrot universe. Fueled by Gen-Z meme culture and AI-generated madness, this game unleashes a world of mutant creatures and meme-fueled mayhem. From dancing cappuccinos to cactus-bodied elephants, every tap pulls you deeper into a spiral of satire and brainrot. It is weird, it is wild, and it is wonderfully addictive. You will not believe what you are unlocking next!

title: Magic Piano Music
description: Ready to become a piano master? In Magic Piano Music, tap the magic tiles to follow the beats and play your favorite music. Follow the rhythm of the music and click with precision, don't miss any notes. The game will end after three misses. There's tons of music here like classic piano music, pop music and more! Every song will take you on an immersive arcade rhythm adventure.

title: Race It: Car Racing
description:
Race It: Car Racing – High-Speed City Showdown! ??

Get ready for the ultimate adrenaline rush in Race It: Car Racing – a fast-paced, action-packed racing game where every second counts!

Step into the driver’s seat as you race through bustling city streets, facing off against a rival car in a thrilling 1v1 challenge. Swipe, drift, and dash your way to the finish line, earning rewards and unlocking new upgrades along the way!

title: Bolt Climb: Tap to the Top
description: Bolt Climb: Tap to the Top is an addictive one-touch climbing game where you control a cute bolt on a mission to climb as high as possible! Just tap and hold to rise — the higher you go, the harder it gets. Can you set a new record?

title: Italian Brainrot in Geometry Dash
description:
Italian Brainrot in Geometry Dash:
Explore a world where a geometric wave rushes through crazy obstacles, overcoming challenges one after another. Rhythm, chaos, and a splash of Italian madness — test your reaction and endurance in this geometric trial!

On different levels, you’ll encounter various Italian Brainrot animals: Tralalero Tralala, Tung Tung Tung Sahur, Brr Brr Patapim, Lirili Larila.

title: Last to leave circle Obby
description:
Last to leave circle Obby - is a dynamic online game in the style of Roblox, where only the most dexterous and persistent can win! Exciting obby challenges, dangerous traps and intense battles with other players are waiting for you. Going outside the circle means you're out, and the circle is getting smaller and smaller!

Tense obby challenges that will test your reaction and agility.
Roblox-style game with unique multiplayer.
Ability to compete with friends and players from all over the world.

title: Dig a hole in Russia
description: It all started when Grandpa lost the keys to his old Soviet car somewhere in the yard. Armed with a shovel, you're now digging a proper Russian hole—deeper and deeper. Unearth valuable resources, upgrade your gear, level up your skills, and unlock new underground secrets. Who knows what lies beneath familiar soil? Just don’t forget why you started: without his keys, Grandpa’s not a legend—he’s just a grumpy old man!

title: Idle Barber Shop
description:
Idle Barber Shop – Build Your Haircut Empire! ✂️?
Step into the world of classic trims and modern styles in Idle Barber Shop, the ultimate idle tycoon simulation where you manage, upgrade, and grow your very own barbershop business!

title: HomeRun Derby
description: Step up to the plate and experience the excitement of Baseball's exhilarating Home Run Derby! Swing your bat and aim for the fences to hit as many home runs as you can. Time your swings carefully to score big points and keep the crowd cheering! How many home runs can you hit in a row? Test your skills and see if you can become the ultimate Home Run champion!

title: Crocodilo Tralalero Run
description: Crocodilo Tralalero Run is a fast-paced platformer where your Crazy fiends runs forward automatically, and you must jump, dodge obstacles, defeat enemies, and collect coins. Unlock and customize your Crazy fiends in the shop to enhance your adventure. With its exciting gameplay and charming rewards, Crocodilo, Tralalero, Tsung Tsung and others characters offers fun for all ages!

title: Craft Man Vs Giant TNT
description: Are you ready to enter a crazy world full of giants and TNT? Craftsman vs Giant TNT is an exciting Minecraft-style game that challenges your creativity, strategy and courage. Play as a brave craftsman in a dangerous world. Choose between two different modes: Destroy TNT or City TNT. Build fortifications and use weapons to repel giant enemies.

title: Chocolate Dream: Idle Factory
description:
Chocolate Dream: Idle Factory – Build your delicious chocolate empire!

Step into the sweetest adventure ever! In Chocolate Dream: Idle Factory, you become the owner of a growing chocolate factory. Produce tasty chocolate bars, expand your production lines, upgrade machines, and unlock secret recipes to dominate the chocolate world!

title: Mahjong Classic
description: Relax and challenge your mind with Mahjong Classic, a timeless tile-matching puzzle game with a beautiful, traditional aesthetic. Enjoy the calming backdrop and classic gameplay as you match identical tiles to eliminate them from the board. The goal is simple: clear all the tiles to win the game. But it’s not just about matching any tiles—only the free tiles on the edge can be selected, adding a layer of strategy and focus to your gameplay.

title: Super Star Animal Salon
description: Welcome to Super Star - Animal Salon, a paws - itively delightful casual simulator game that's perfect for girls with a passion for fashion and animals! In this game, you step into the role of a superstar animal stylist. Your very own salon awaits, filled with all the tools of the trade. First, meet your furry, feathery, or scaly clients. There are cute puppies with a zebra, an elephant, and a leopard. Start with the hair.

title: Hero Transform Race
description: Hero Transform Race is an action-packed and fun parkour game that transforms you from an ordinary person into a legendary superhero. Your goal is to reach the end of the track by transforming into the appropriate superhero form for the obstacles you encounter!

title: Animal Block Pop Puzzle
description: Animal Block Pop Puzzle is a fun puzzle game with cute animal-themed visuals. ??✨ Match 3+ animal-shaped blocks ?? on a grid to clear them and score points. As you progress, the game gets faster and adds new tile colors for a growing challenge. With easy drag-and-drop controls and vibrant graphics, it offers a relaxing yet exciting experience for all ages.

title: Tralala La La La italiano
description: Immerse yourself in an exciting adventure! In this game you will have to connect Italian animals. Collect a collection of rare animals, discover new species and create your own virtual zoo!

title: Bone Doctor Shoulder Case
description: Oouch, our cheerleader took a tumble and hurt her shoulder. Help fix her up with a quick shoulder surgery by following the right steps to ensure she recovers fully. Once she healed, give her a make over with some stylish outfits and accessories from our collection, so she can return to the squad looking better than ever!

title: Princess Rescue Fruit Connect
description: Begin a fruity puzzle adventure. Princess Rescue Fruit Connect is a delightful match puzzle game where your mission is to rescue a beautiful princess by matching fruits and solving tricky levels. Connect two identical fruits to eliminate them. But notice clearing the board before time runs out. All while progressing to rescue the princess.

title: Ship Parking Game
description: Solve colorful passenger seating puzzles on ships in this unique traffic jam puzzle game. Help passengers find their seats based on color patterns while managing the flow of people through parking lot-style challenges. It's not just about parking - you're a traffic director managing passenger jams on the high seas.

title: Timewalker
description: Time Walker: Survive – Embark on a thrilling journey through apocalyptic landscapes in this fast-paced 2D top-down survival game! As a Timewalker, battle relentless hordes of zombies across different eras, fighting for survival against increasingly intense waves of the undead.

title: Archer Go
description: Endless arrows, endless fun! Get ready for a thrilling endless game that will put your archery skills to the test. Travel through a fantastic landscape with your bow, aiming at targets along the way. Keep playing, earn points and unlock exciting customization options.

title: Ellie And Friends Art Bloom Aesthetic
description: Ellie And Friends Art Bloom Aesthetic is all about exploring creativity through unique fashion and art! Dress them up in colorful outfits, mix and match funky accessories, and dive into the world of artistic expression. From painting and drawing to choosing the perfect look, this game lets you celebrate individuality and artistic flair with Ellie and her friends. Get ready to unleash your inner artist!

title: Kingdom match
description: Kingdom match is a competitive match-3 game with castle decoration options! Complete levels, compete with other players and build the best castle!

title: Catch The Goose
description: Catch The Goose is a puzzle elimination mini-game. Players can tap identical items to automatically send them to the bottom slot - when three matching items gather, they get eliminated. When players successfully clear all items arranged in the grid, they get to "catch" a mischievous goose. Its addictive simplicity, stress-relieving design, and playful art style have made it a cultural phenomenon.

title: Diamond mosaic
description: Ready to create your own masterpiece from a scattering of diamonds on your screen? Come to our mosaic!  Fill images with diamond scatter!

title: Deep in the Lab - Chapter 1
description: Deep in the Lab is 2D '90 style survival horror game, with old style pre-rendered backgrounds, puzzles to solve, keys to collect, monster to avoid or defeat (your choice), poor resources, jumpscares, limited saves, FMV and a five floors lab to explore.

title: Flight Sim Air Traffic control
description: Flight Sim is a game where you have to guide aircraft to their landing zones, keep the skies safe to complete the levels to get high score.

title: Pet Tile Master
description: Enjoy a fun pet-themed tile-matching challenge in Pet Tile Master! Draw up to 9 tiles featuring adorable pets and match three identical ones to clear them. Be careful—if the stack fills up with 9 tiles, the game is over! Use smart moves to uncover hidden tiles and complete each level. Have fun with cute animals, relaxing gameplay, and tricky puzzles!

title: Downhill Car Ride: Crash Test
description:
Put on a real destructive show!

Forget about safety, in this game you need to check how strong the dummy is. At your disposal is a huge pile of dummies, an abandoned town, an incredibly huge arsenal and complete freedom of action! In this game you can check what will happen if you crash a motorcycle at full speed into a house with dynamite or what will happen if you jump out of the car a second before the accident!

title: Kingdom Cats
description: Become friends with the King of Cats and build a whole kingdom together! Dive into a colorful, exciting world where you can fully demonstrate your creativity!

title: Graduation Makeup Trends
description: Discover the latest makeup trends with our Graduation Makeup Trends game! From bold and fierce to soft and elegant, this game offers a variety of makeup options to suit your style. We bring 3 BFFs, each with a unique style, many makeup options, stunning dresses, and accessories for your inspiration. Mixed with floral printed dresses, golden jewelry, and holographic accessories, in the Graduation Makeup Trends game, you will find everything you need to help these girls make a statement.

title: Build A Queen 2025
description: In Build a Queen 2025, you will embark on a fun journey to become a real queen. You will need to make your way through different platform levels with your opponents. Choose outfits, skin colors, and more according to your goals. Dress up in the most glamorous queen look, meet the prince, and win. You can collect money to unlock more dance steps.

title: Happy Blocks
description:
Happy Blocks - Fun Puzzle Game for Everyone!

? Dive into the colorful world of Happy Blocks!
Arrange and clear the blocks smartly to conquer challenging levels.
Tap, move, and stack your way to the highest score!
Can you solve them all?

title: Ping Pong Battle Table Tennis
description: Want to have an intense table tennis battle? In Ping Pong Battle - Table Tennis, you will become a ping pong pro and compete with your opponents in a fierce competition! This game combines realistic paddle manipulation with exciting match simulation.

title: Serious Head
description: Prepare to defend yourself. Purchase defensive structures, recharge your energy and fight off waves of monsters. Kill bosses and upgrade weapons. Complete the final day and close the portals!

title: Cooking Stories: Fun cafe game
description:
Become the host of the popular transformation cooking show — Cooking Stories! You are not just a chef, you are a culinary genius, a style master, and an interior designer. Participants come to you at their most desperate moment: they urgently need help — and only you can change and save their lives!

But that’s not all...  
Take a peek behind the scenes of the TV show: intrigue, emotions, unexpected twists — all this in the game Cooking Stories!

title: Geometry Wave Hero
description: Geometry Wave Hero is an exciting rhythm-based game that takes players on a thrilling journey through a vibrant color world. This game offers a unique twist on the classic Geometry Dash formula, focusing exclusively on the wave game mode. Players must navigate their wave through a series of challenging obstacles, using simple one-touch mechanics to control its movement.

title: Fly Fly Fly
description:
Fly Fly Fly is a Flappy Bird alike game, where you have to fly through 30 different levels, avoiding obstacles an collecting berries. 
If you hit the ground it will be game over, if you crash on one of the earth worms around the level, you will lose a life. If you lost all your lives, it's game over. You can restore your health collecting the berries you will find around the level. Do your best and beat all the 30 levels and show the world what you really are!

title: Stick Hero Fight
description: Enter the most nervous stickman battles. In Stick Hero Fight, you as a mighty stickman hero. Fight through waves of enemies using incredible battle skills. This action game lets you upgrade your hero and unleash devastating attacks to dominate every fight! Use punches, weapons, and powerful skills to deliver deadly attacks.

title: Rotate Rings - Circle Puzzle
description:
Rotate Rings - Circle Puzzle: Twist Your Mind!
Welcome to Rotate Rings, the ultimate circle puzzle challenge!
Your mission is simple: rotate the rings to align the colors or images correctly.
As you progress, the puzzles get trickier, testing your strategy and problem-solving skills.

title: Panda Lu Treehouse
description: Hey, animal lovers! Enter the enchanting world of Panda Lu's Tree House, a super fun casual simulator that will warm your heart. In this game, you play as the caretaker of the adorable panda Lu. Your adventure begins by building a magnificent tree house, a cozy and vibrant home for your furry friend.

title: Shoot Run Monster Hunting
description: Welcome to the interesting parkour world of Shoot Run: Monster Hunting! In this challenging game,you will be a brave shooter. Run, collect, fight and shoot all kinds of scary monsters, show your courage and skill! Enjoy running in a variety of scenarios, challenging speed and agility.

title: Meme challenge.io
description:
"Meme Challenge.io" is straight-up chaos.
It’s you vs. the wildest, most unhinged character names ever like Spaghetti Tualetti and Bombardino Crocodilo. Tap fast, think faster, and don’t get caught slippin’. It’s giving brain-lag.
Only real ones can vibe their way to the Wcup.

title: Wood Block Jam
description:
Wood Block Jam is a vibrant, addictive puzzle game where you slide colored blocks to matching doors. 

Swipe and slide through hundreds of creatively designed levels, featuring arrow blocks, layer blocks, freeze blocks, lock blocks, and more. 

Plan your moves to overcome barriers and clear each board using the fewest moves. 

With intuitive controls, smooth animations, and mind-bending challenges from easy to extreme, Wood Block Jam delivers endless brain-teasing fun!

title: World War 2 Shooter
description: World War 2 Shooter is a new first person shooter where you can become a real soldier of World War 2 and fight against enemies! Defeat foes in dynamic battles and be a hero on the battlefield!

title: Obby Survive Parkour
description:
Obby Survivor Parkour is a fast-paced 3D parkour and escape game designed for players who trust their reflexes. You will test both your speed and balance skills while trying to survive in the obstacle filled course!

Each section is full of new traps and platforms that will challenge you even more. Try to survive tsunami waves, obstacle courses, lava attacks, snowball storms and red light green light game and reach the finish line.  Can you be one of the few who can reach the end of the course?

title: Pentaword
description: Guess the hidden five-letter word in just six tries! Use logic, spelling, and word skills in this brain teaser. Can you crack the Pentaword?

title: Zombie Shooting King
description: The apocalypse is here! Hordes of zombies are swarming the streets. You are the last line of defense. Grab your gun, sharpen your shooting skills, and unleash unstoppable firepower to survive. Shoot fuel tanks, airdrops, and more to get more firepower to destroy tons of zombies. Get diamonds to upgrade your talents like Guardrail, ATK Boost, Crit Rate, or Coin earning!

title: Woody Tap Block
description:
Woody Tap Block is an addictive puzzle game where you have to use logical thinking to move and remove wooden blocks in the right direction. With simple yet challenging mechanics, the game offers a relaxing yet engaging experience.
Plan your moves in the correct order to clear all the blocks.
As you progress through levels, the puzzles become more challenging with new obstacles and block types to overcome.

title: Fruit Connect 3
description: Get ready for a tropical twist in Fruit Connect 3 – the juicy sequel to the popular fruit-matching puzzle series! This vibrant new chapter brings even more summer vibes, exotic fruits, and relaxing gameplay that fans love. Collect daily rewards, participate in limited-time summer events, and unlock fresh, fruity designs along the way. It’s a fun, family-friendly Mahjong-style connect game for all ages – no download required!

title: Celebrity Aesthetic Challenge
description: Celebrity Aesthetic Challenge lets you explore a range of unique celebrity-inspired styles! Compete in fun fashion challenges as you mix and match outfits, accessories, and hairstyles to recreate iconic looks. From E-girl and Soft-girl vibes to edgy streetwear and glam red carpet ensembles, showcase your creativity and win the ultimate fashion battle. Can you rise to the challenge and become the trendsetting fashion icon? Let the style showdown begin!

title: Table Tennis Open
description: Discover a casual, easy-to-play game for hours of endless fun. Face off against your opponent, bounce the ball as its speed increases, and aim for the highest score. Earn coins with each hit to upgrade your racket!

title: Gemstone Glam
description: Welcome to the fabulous world filled with sparkling gems! Here you will meet two princess girlfriends who adore fashionable outfits and the glitter of colorful stones in fashionable outfits. Try on dresses inspired by the radiance of a diamond, the passion of a ruby, the freshness of an emerald and the mystery of an amethyst. Create shining combinations of hairstyles, dresses and accessories to transform young princesses into real fashion queens. Feel like a real stylist of the jewelry kingdom!

title: Rent out - Landlord Tycoon
description: In this captivating world of landlord games, you'll start with a modest property portfolio and a dream to become the ultimate real estate and house tycoon. Your goal is to buy, sell, and manage properties to maximize your profits and become a successful business and house tycoon in this rent game. Whether it's residential apartments, commercial complexes, or luxurious villas, it's your chance to be rich in this rent game.

title: Soccer Tournament
description: Soccer Tournament is a fun and fast-paced tabletop-style soccer game where you control a team of caps, flicking them to pass, shoot, and score goals. Strategize your moves, outplay your opponent, and aim for victory in this exciting, skill-based challenge!

title: Color Cargo Puzzle Rush
description: Color Cargo Puzzle Rush is the ultimate blend of color puzzle games, and sorting games! Dive into this stress-relieving world of ASMR games where you match delivery boxes with the right cargo buses by their colors. Perfect for fans of color sort puzzle and fun games, this game is all about strategy, speed, and precision.

title: Geometrix
description: Geometrix is a game about guessing the right shape. Defeat the enemies copying their shapes. When you collide with the evil shapes, if you have the same geometrical figure, you will destroy the enemy, otherwise you will lost a health point. Lost more than three points and it will be game over. Face over 40 levels, with increasing difficulty, enemies with up to 6 different geometric figures. You have to be fast and skilled to beat this game. Will you make it? If you want to know it, just try it!

title: High Heels Collect Run
description: Ready to begin a stylish running adventure in High Heels Collect Run! In this casual game, you’ll run through various fun environments. Stepping on heels can make you feel like a queen! Everyone loves to look perfect, and these heels will make you shine like a star!

title: Brawl Bros Squad
description: Introducing a new exciting third-person shooter — Brawl Bros Squad! Fight opponents in a variety of conditions. Discover a variety of unique skins to make yourself unique. Enjoy dynamic jumps, accurate shooting and get ready for intense battles. Become a real champion among players around the world and prove that you are the best in this crazy world!

title: Br Br Patapim: Obby Challenge
description: Br Br Patapim: Obby Challenge is a wild meme-fueled obby game where you’ll jump, fall, and laugh your way through chaos! Inspired by the viral spirit of Italian Brainrot Animals of TikTok trends, this game turns parkour madness into pure comedy. Take control of the legendary Brr Brr Patapim and conquer ridiculous levels full of traps, platforms, and meme-powered surprises.

title: Catch The Pig
description: This is a casual elimination game. The main purpose of the game is to find three identical pigs, catch them, and collect all the pig collections!

title: Pool Merge Mania
description:
Pool Merge Mania!

Get ready for a wildly addictive twist on classic pool mechanics!
In Pool Merge Mania, shoot balls into the arena and watch them bounce, collide, and merge into higher-level balls. 

But beware, you can only have 15 balls on the table.

Tip: Fewer balls = more control. Merge them quick to stay in the game!

title: Ultrahero Vs Monsters Royale Battle
description: Ultrahero Vs Monsters Royale Battle is an action fighting game where you, as a mighty Ultrahero. Battle against waves of evil monsters in a 3D world. Every battle is a new adventure. Feel the perfect fusion of tower defense and nervous arcade action in this game. As a hero, you must not only fight off monsters in epic battles but also use tower defense tactics to protect your base.

title: Mr. Drifter: Car Chase Simulator
description:
Run fast, crash hard, and cheat death — in style.

Race through a chaotic low-poly city as you dodge police, traffic, and total destruction. Use game-changing power-ups like Slow-Mo, Freeze, and EMP Blasts to escape the impossible.

Unlock wild getaway cars
⚡ Grab power-ups mid-chase
 Smash through obstacles & roadblocks
Stylized low-poly world with top-down tilt
Endless cops. Infinite chaos.

One rule: don’t stop. How long can you stay free?

title: Feed me Monsters! Idle Battle
description: The fate of the world is in your hands. Will you rise to the challenge and become a beacon of hope in a land filled with darkness?

title: Mini Games Relax Collection 2
description: Relax and take a mini-game tour! Mini Games: Relax Collection 2 brings you a series of casual and fun mini-games, designed for you to relax in your spare time! There are various types of games,each easy to play and extremely fun, allowing you to immerse yourself easily in the game world.

title: Noob: Saving friends
description:
"Noob: Saving friends" - An adventure in an interesting and captivating world with Nubik.

Together with Nubik, you will mine and sell ores, buy new pickaxes, upgrade skills, and try to uncover all the secrets! Will you be able to challenge the dragon and earn the maximum coins? Or maybe luck from the lucky block will smile upon you?

title: Italian Brainrot Find the Differences
description: In this game you have to locate the differences between the two pictures in the limited amount of time given to play each time! To play, use your mouse as control. Make sure that you don’t make a mistake more than three times because that will make you fail. One minute is the total time you will play through the 20 levels in this game! In each level you have seven differences. Good luck!

title: SuStainable
description: As the watchful guardian of a prestigious museum, you're tasked with protecting the priceless artwork from eco-activists turned vandals. To succeed, you must scour the exhibition halls, gather clues, and apprehend the culprit in the act. Once apprehended, you'll conduct a tense interrogation to uncover the truth. Will you be able to find the incriminating paint bucket before the damage is done, or will the suspect's cunning and your own inexperience lead to a disastrous outcome?

title: Cube Speed Dash
description: Jump, dash, and survive in Cube Speed Dash, a high-speed arcade challenge where every second counts! Master lightning-fast reflexes as you guide a nimble cube through treacherous obstacle courses filled with spikes, traps, and deadly pitfalls. One wrong move—and it’s game over!

title: Capybara Block Shot
description:
Join the chillest capybara in a relaxing puzzle adventure!
Merge number blocks, unlock high scores, and vibe your way to 2048 and beyond. Simple to play, soothing to master.
Capybara Block Drop is your cozy brain break!

title: High Heel Design
description: Imagine you are a fashion shoemaker who produces the best high heels ever. In High Heel Design, you are in charge of fashion shoe design. Yes, what you produce is not sneakers, sandals, or boots, but high heels only! Unleash your creativity and combine elements to realize your own stunning high heels in this shoe-designing game.

title: Car Care Repair DuDu Mechanic
description: Car Care Repair DuDu Mechanic is a casual simulation game where you act as a skillful mechanic. Your clients meet diverse problems with their cars: broken windows, cracked car doors, flat tires, malfunctioning motors, lack of car parts...

title: U Shape Puzzle
description:
U Shape Puzzle is a unique and satisfying puzzle game where you tap on U-shaped blocks to slide them out — but only if the path is clear! Think before you tap, plan your moves, and remove every U block to finish the level.

With simple one-touch controls and brain-teasing logic, this game is perfect for casual players who love puzzles with a twist.

title: Cop Run 3d
description: Cop Run 3D is an arcade-style parkour game that brings you on an exciting chase adventure! In this 3D game world, you'll play as a cop, running and jumping through the city streets. Avoid obstacles, and collect various rewards! The gameplay is simple yet fun. Use your agility to jump the fence, avoid spikes, and collect coins.

title: Trading Games Playtime
description: Hey there, game lovers! Get ready to embark on an exciting journey with Trading Games Playtime, the ultimate casual game that's all about relaxation and non-stop fun! This game is a magical blend of various mini-games, making it a one-stop destination for your entertainment needs. First off, it doubles as a fantastic antistress simulator.

title: Cards: Klondike Solitaire
description:
A classic card game known for its simple and fun mechanics. If you love solitaire games, then this game is just for you! A famous card puzzle game that is popular among players all over the world.
Perfectly relaxing!

title: Chill Clicker
description: Chill Clicker is a clicker game where you multiply the Chill Capybara population by clicking. You can buy various upgrades to increase the output of Chill Capybaras, change the weather, and unlock new skins to make you the coolest Chill Capybara in town.

title: Kitkat Puzzle
description:
Enter the world of Kitkat Puzzle, a captivating and intricate pin puzzle game where your strategic thinking and creativity are put to the test.

The mission is straightforward - unlock kitkat holes to make these chocolate bars fall in the correct sequence. Sounds simple, yet with unlimited levels of varying complexity, it promises an intriguing brain-teasing journey.

title: Italian Brainrot Quiz
description: Italian Brainrot Quiz is a chaotic meme-guessing game where you match bizarre names to iconic brainrot characters! From Tralalero Tralala to Bombardiro Crocodilo and Tung Tung Tung Sahur – can you guess them all? Each round is a wild ride through surreal Italian meme culture. Laugh, confuse your friends, and become the ultimate Brainrot Champion. Spaghetti logic guaranteed. Ready to play?

title: Brainrot Merge Drop Puzzles
description: Drop and merge Italian Brainrot. Trallallero Trallala, Tum Tum Tum Saur, Boneca Ambalabu and more. Play funny memes. Drag and drop memes.

title: Gun Rush
description: Begin an action-packed gun battle runner. Gun Rush is an electrifying arcade game that combines gun merging with platform running. Run forward, avoid obstacles, collect weapons, and blast your way to the finish line with ultimate firepower. Control the direction of your gun, shooting power, ATK speed, and Range to increase its value. Increase your damage by using high-value doors.

title: Metro Escape
description: On Metro escape you must search the room for items that will help you escape. Search for itens in the metro and use them to solve the puzzles. Look carefully at the various patterns around the metro and solve the riddles. Good luck to search for your way to escape!

title: Capybara Go!
description: Enter the wonderful world of Capybara. In Capybara Go, begin a strategic adventure. You'll be forming and commanding your own little Capybara army. Defeat your opponents and conquer everything through strategy and combat. Lay out your Capybara's to take advantage of each one's strengths and use strategy to defeat powerful enemies.

title: Idle Market Tycoon
description:
Grow your idle market, hire managers, and earn money even offline!
Idle Market Tycoon is a fun and addictive idle simulation game where you build and manage your own shopping empire. Start with a small stall, grow your business, hire smart managers, and upgrade every department to attract more customers and earn profits – even while you're offline!
? From fruit stands to electronic stores, expand your marketplace step by step and become the ultimate market tycoon.

title: Merge Fellas Online
description: Enjoy the Italian Brainrot meme world in this Merge game. Immerse yourself in the Italian Brainrot world and merge identical characters to accumulate points and reach the highest score. A simple and easy mechanic, drop characters together to form higher-value ones, providing rewards with each successful merge.  Solve the puzzle and merge all the pets!

title: Geometry Vibes Monster
description: Geometry Vibes Monster is a reaction-based arcade game where you must dodge incoming obstacles, spikes, and battle against a variety of unique monsters. Each monster features distinct attack patterns that you must skillfully avoid. Your main goal is to navigate your spaceship as far as possible while surviving the onslaught of attacks.

title: Patterns
description: Help Ellie recreate magical patterns using grass, fire, clouds, and more elements as you uncover the hidden order of each level.

title: Italian Brainrot Obby Parkour
description:
Italian Brainrot Obby Parkour is a wild and hilarious 2 player platforming experience that blends meme-fueled chaos with classic obby parkour mechanics. Inspired by games like Tower of Hell, this title brings the unpredictable humor of the Italian brainrot meme universe into a 3D climbing challenge.

Available characters are: 
-Tung Tung Sahur
-Brr Brr Patapim
-Burbaloni Luliloli
-Frigo Camelo
-Girafa Celestre
-Lirili Larila
-Orangutini Annaucini
-Tralalero Tralala
-Vaca Saturno Saturnita

title: Hyper Nurse: Hospital Games
description: Get ready to navigate through the fast-paced world of healthcare, where every second counts. Your mission as a hyper nurse is to provide exceptional care to patients, manage critical situations, and ensure the smooth operation of the hospital. Get ready to put your multitasking skills to the test as you juggle multiple tasks and make crucial decisions in hyper nurse: hospital games.

title: Ragdoll Bob Puzzle
description: Help Bob reach his goal in Ragdoll Bob Puzzle, a quirky and fun 2D puzzle game that challenges your brain and creativity! Bob is a floppy ragdoll who needs your help to get to the endpoint while collecting as many stars as possible along the way. But here’s the twist—you can’t control Bob directly. Instead, you must guide his path by placing a limited number of blocks and objects in the right spots to create a safe and clever route.

title: My Pet Care Salon
description: My Pet Care Salon invites you to run your very own pet spa! Groom, pamper, and style a variety of adorable pets with fun, interactive activities. From bath time and nail trimming to trendy haircuts and accessory styling, provide the best care for your furry clients. Manage your salon, meet different pets, and earn rewards as you create a welcoming environment for pets and their owners. Transform your pet care dreams into reality and become the ultimate pet stylist!

title: Color Block Jam
description: Color Block Jam – an exciting puzzle game! Move the colored blocks, solve logic challenges, and complete levels. The game has many levels, from simple tasks to real brain teasers.

title: Match 3D Puzzle Saga
description: Ready to match and collect? Solve puzzles to earn coins, unlock powerful power-ups and complete daily challenges to grab extra rewards and sweet bonuses. The more you play, the more opportunities you have to boost your score!

title: Strykon
description:
Strykon is a mobile FPS game with exciting missions and battles. Play different modes like Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Free-for-All, where your goal is to survive.
Choose from many weapons, like pistols, rifles, shotguns, and snipers. Each gun has its own style. Enjoy great graphics, realistic sound, and easy controls. Earn rewards with the Battle Pass to keep the game interesting. Whether you complete missions or fight enemies, this shooter is full of action anytime, anywhere!

title: Sort Puzzle - Nuts and Bolts
description: Play Sort Puzzle - Nuts and Bolts, a free and addictive sorting game! Train your brain by stacking nuts of the same color. Simple yet challenging, it's the perfect casual game to relax and sharpen your logic skills. Play now and start sorting!

title: Starry Style Dorama of Dream
description: Welcome to an exciting journey into the world of Korean doramas heroes! Here you can become a stylist for two aspiring young film actors: a young actress whose heart beats to the rhythm of romantic stories, and a charismatic actor whose smile can melt even the coldest hearts. You will be able to choose from a variety of outfits, accessories and hairstyles, creating unique images that emphasize the individuality of your characters.

title: Big Block Blast
description:
Place triangles and blocks to build 2x2 BIG BLOCKS! Drag and drop shapes into the grid to complete full squares made of triangles. Matching colors gives you bonus points, so in Big Block Blast you must aim for smart and colorful combos!
Some blocks have special powers and can even be placed on top of others. Use them strategically to unlock new moves and clear space. Big Block Blast is a simple to play game but tricky to master! How many BIG BLOCKS can you make?

title: Looper
description:
Looper is a joyous and melodious music game that tests your sense of rhythm and timing. Get ready to start tapping your way through a colorful universe of beats and melodies! With hundreds of unique levels, Looper is the perfect game to soothe your puzzling needs.

As you progress, the constellations become more complex, and the beats more satisfying. But be warned, mistiming a tap could lead to an epic crash and burn - so make sure to bring your A-game!

title: Football Rush 3D
description: Football Rush 3d is a fast-paced, one-touch soccer game that puts you in the boots of a solo football hero. Forget complex controls—just tap, strike, and score! Whether you’re curving shots from midfield or charging down the pitch with speed boosts, every moment is packed with action.

title: Delta Force Airborne
description:
This game offers a whole new level of graphics and sound design that completely immerses you in a realistic atmosphere of battles. 
Shoot and use tactical thinking to overcome obstacles and achieve victory together with your team. 
Explore a variety of maps, each of which is full of unique opportunities and strategic points.
Become a master of team play by coordinating with your teammates and using different character classes to create the perfect strategy.

title: Powerwash Simulator - 3D Wash
description: There’s no stain too tough, no dirt too thick that you can’t handle. So gear up, point your washer, and get ready to bring the shine back to everything around you.

title: Mega Ramp Car Stunts
description:
Get ready for the ultimate stunt-driving challenge in Mega Ramp Car Stunts! Take control of powerful cars and race down sky-high mega ramps to perform mind-blowing jumps, flips, and tricks. Defy gravity as you soar through the air and land like a pro on impossible tracks.

With dynamic gameplay, extreme stunts, and intense visuals, this is the stunt arena where only the boldest drivers survive!

title: Clap Clap Nightmare
description: Clap Clap is a short indie horror game that puts you in the shoes of a house sitter, experiencing strange occurrences in a seemingly ordinary home.

title: Capybara Block Drop
description:
Capybara Block Drop is a fast-paced, brain-teasing puzzle game where merging numbers and staying calm under pressure is the key to survival.

Drop numbered blocks into columns, combine matching tiles, and clear space with big combos.
But watch out, if the board fills up, it’s game over, and your capybara buddy might just lose his cool!

With colorful visuals and satisfying number-merging mechanics, Capybara Block Drop delivers endless strategic fun wrapped in a charming, lighthearted package.

title: Blocks Stack Rush
description: Enjoy an addictive stacking adventure. In Blocks Stack Rush, you’ll control a little block character running and begin a fun pixelated journey. Collect blocks, stack them high and race against time to build the perfect picture. You need to align each block and keep putting together the complete picture.

title: Pops Quest
description: In this story-based platformer, you'll step into the shoes of a heroic protagonist driven by an undying love for their child. Experience the perfect fusion of action and platforming as Pop's Quest takes you on a high-octane adventure. With its fast-paced gameplay levels designed, you'll be engrossed in a world that demands agility, strategy, and quick reflexes. As you progress, you'll be emotionally invested and driven to save your child from danger.

title: Sticker Puzzle Book
description: Step into the captivating world of Sticker Puzzle, where creativity and strategy come together in a beautifully immersive experience. Explore a vibrant sticker book filled with artistic challenges, visual storytelling, and mind-bending puzzles. Designed as a peaceful chromatic retreat, Sticker Puzzle blends the calming satisfaction of sticker art with the engaging thrill of strategic problem-solving — the perfect harmony of relaxation and mental stimulation.

title: Vortex io
description:
Play Vortex.io for free! Swallow everything in your path and become the biggest vortex in this fast-paced io game.

Vortex.io is a competitive .io game where you control a growing vortex that can swallow objects, vehicles, and even other players. As you absorb more items, your size increases, making you more powerful in the arena. The game features smooth controls and intense gameplay, requiring quick reflexes and smart movement to survive and dominate your rivals in real time.

title: My Purrfect Cat Hotel
description: Welcome to My Purrfect Cat Hotel, a super cute cat hotel simulation management game. Enjoy cute and vivid cartoon cat animations. This is the vacation spot for all meow stars, and your mission is to create the most cozy cat hotel. Serving a variety of adorable cats and catering to their needs. Make your hotel the most popular animal tycoon hotel.

title: Secret Galaxy. Match-three
description: "Secrets of the Galaxy" is an exciting match-3 game where you embark on a space journey with pilot Inessa and her faithful robot A.S.K.A. Their ship is damaged, and they are stranded in the depths of the universe. To return home, you must solve engaging puzzles by matching elements and creating powerful combos. Along the way, you will face asteroids, laser traps, space distortions, and other unique obstacles.

title: Rope Sorting
description:
In the game “Rope Sorting” you are waiting for exciting puzzles, where you need to sort the ropes. Pass an infinite number of levels, collect stars, use aids, be the first!

Rollback actions - allows you to return to the previous step to take a different path.

Adding a coil - makes it easier to pass a level by adding another empty coil.

title: Paint Roller
description: Control two tethered spheres in this unique painting challenge. Click to anchor one sphere in place while the other swings around it on an elastic tether, leaving a dynamic paint trail. Your objective? Strategically rotate your tethered pair to completely coat all target cylinders in each level.

title: Sprunki Torches Maze
description: Light up all the torches in the room to unlock the door. Some torches are linked and will toggle together when activated. Watch out for bats! Contact with them results in a game over! Your goal is to exit the house through the front yard door.

title: Roller Coaster Rush
description:
Speed through tracks in Roller Coaster Rush! Play free and online in this thrilling coaster game.

Roller Coaster Rush is an exhilarating 3D game that puts you in control of a speeding roller coaster. Your goal is to accelerate through the tracks without crashing, performing crazy jumps and navigating steep drops. Hold to speed up and release to slow down just in time. Each level challenges your timing and precision as you rush through colorful and thrilling environments.

title: CraftMart
description:
Noob decided to go into business and open his own shop. And what do all the people of Minecraft want? That's right - to eat!

In Noob's shop you can always buy beet soup and bread! And also a lot of other food.

And now all the residents of Minecraft rushed to the best store! Help Noob to serve all the customers! No one should go hungry! :)

Build new fields for wheat and beets, get a cow and a chicken and expand the shop to the maximum assortment!

title: Choo Choo Spider Monster Train
description:
Welcome to the most terrifying train ride of your life!
Cho-Cho Scary Charles: Spider Train is a chilling open-world survival horror shooter where your only lifeline is a small yellow train armed with a machine gun and a whole lot of courage.
Face off against Charles — the monstrous spider-train hybrid that haunts a remote island, preying on unsuspecting humans. No one knows where he came from, but one thing is clear — he won't stop until he's fed.

title: Flower Collection
description: Flower Collection is a poetic casual adventure game where players explore a beautiful natural world to collect various rare and beautiful flowers. The game combines exploration, collection, and light puzzle elements to bring players a peaceful and delightful gaming experience.

title: Cat Mini Restaurant
description: In this heartwarming and healing simulation management game "Meow Flavor Restaurant", you will become a little cat owner who loves cooking and personally create your own dream restaurant. Starting from a small cat house kitchen, gradually upgrading equipment, developing new recipes, recruiting cute cat employees, until becoming the most popular internet celebrity restaurant in the city! More than 30 cats with different personalities and skills are waiting for you to collect!

title: Coffee Craze - Sorting Game
description:
Coffee Craze - Sorting Game is the ultimate café puzzle experience where your barista skills are put to the test! Sort colorful coffee cups, match drinks by type, and serve them quickly to satisfy every customer.

With intuitive drag-and-drop mechanics, fast-paced levels, and delightful coffee-themed visuals, it’s the perfect blend of relaxing and brain-teasing fun.

title: Maze Escape Toilet Rush
description: What's the most urgent situation you can imagine? Of course, it is the last second of finding a toilet. In Maze Escape: Toilet Rush, you'll have a nervous and hilarious maze escape. Each level is a brand-new maze. You need to find the best route to the toilet quickly. Use your logic and intelligence to reach your destination successfully.

title: Shoot And Drive
description:
Radiation is spreading all over the world. People are going crazy, a tough battle for life continues.
After falling into the trap of bandits along with your crewmates, you’ll have to fight to the end. And your best ‘friends’ — a rusty gun and a car that’s about to stall — will come to your aid.

title: Your dream room
description:
Do you dream of creating the perfect room? 
In this game you will become a real interior designer! 
Have fun, experiment and turn an empty space into a cozy dream corner.
Choose wallpaper, flooring and furniture in different styles. Decorate the room with stylish accessories, add coziness!
Choose the color scheme and arrange items as you like.
Experiment with design, create unique interiors and enjoy the process!
Start creating your dream room now!

title: Super Dog Hero Dash
description: Super Dog Hero Dash is an interesting 3D running game with endless adventure and fun! You’ll become a brave dog hero running through a colorful city in this cartoonish world. Begin exciting challenges across various platforms!

title: Children Happy Farm DuDu
description: Hey there, little farmers in the making! Welcome to "Children Happy Farm DuDu"! This is an amazing casual simulator designed just for your kids. In this fun-filled farm world, you'll be the boss of your farm. The farm is full of cute animals like fluffy sheep, clucking chickens, and friendly cows. Your job is to take good care of them. Feed the animals, clean their shelters, and make sure they are happy.

title: BURGER CATCH
description: Move the tray left and right to collect the ordered ingredients! If time runs out or you collect too many extra ingredients, you will lose hearts. If you run out of hearts, it's game over.

title: Purrfect Puzzle
description: Purrfect Puzzle is an adorable cat-themed tile-merging puzzle game where players strategically place and combine cat tiles with different values to achieve higher scores. With relaxing pastel visuals, the game challenges players to think ahead while enjoying a cozy, heartwarming experience. Perfect for puzzle lovers and cat enthusiasts alike!

title: Escape From Tung Tung Sahur
description: Escape From Tung Tung Sahur is a fast-paced runner-platformer where quick reflexes are your only chance of survival! You play as a lone runner escaping the bizarre and relentless anomaly known as Tung Tung Sahur. Sprint across platforms, leap over deadly gaps, and avoid sudden obstacles. With intuitive one-touch controls, the game is easy to play but challenging to master. Each level introduces new platform layouts and jump timing that push your skills to the limit.

title: I Am Security
description: Have you ever wanted to be a hardened security officer and be on the front lines of maintaining order? In I Am Security, an ultra-realistic role-playing simulator, you play the role of a professional security guard. You decide whether or not to allow them to enter. Some guests may try to sneak in with prohibited items and find these hidden items. Performs tasks in a variety of scenarios to identify suspicious persons.

title: Merge Brainrot
description:
Drop and merge the most cursed Italian Brainrot memes!
From "Trallallero Trallala" to "Tum Tum Tum Saur! and "Boneca Ambalabu", they’re all here.
What final Brainrot will you unlock? Dare to find out!

title: Pipe Puzzle: Connect & Flow
description:
Pipe Puzzle: Connect & Flow – Relaxing Brain Teaser
Connect the pipes, let the water flow, and solve hundreds of satisfying puzzles!
Pipe Puzzle: Connect & Flow is a relaxing and addictive puzzle game where your mission is simple: fix the pipes and restore the flow of water. Perfect for all ages, it's the ultimate brain exercise you can play anytime, anywhere.

title: Bubble Shooter Legend
description: Enjoy a fun shooting puzzle game in Bubble Shooter Legend. Use your shooting skills in this casual puzzle game. Your goal is to match bubbles of the same color. Make them explode and disappear to complete each level step by step. Match three or more bubbles of the same color by aiming and firing them to explode and eliminate them!

title: Supermarket Sort: Grocery Game
description: Sharpen your sorting skills, challenge your brain, and race against the clock in each level. With increasingly tricky puzzles and tons of grocery items to sort, the fun never stops!

title: NSR Street Car Racing
description:
Hit the Streets & Dominate the Race! 
Jump into heart-pounding street racing action! Customize powerful cars, master drifts, unleash nitro boosts, and challenge real players in multiplayer races and intense 1v1 duels. Become a street-racing legend!

Ready, Set, Drift!

title: Stickman Gun Shooter
description:
Get ready to dive into a unique shooting experience with Stickman Gun Shooter! Enjoy an experience that invites you to take control of an expert shooter as you use a spinning gun to defeat fun Stickmans.
The game combines realistic ragdoll physics with exciting and simple gameplay - your goal will be to destroy the yellow Stickmans that get in your way, overcoming different levels with different challenges and obstacles, while demonstrating your sniper skills!

title: Buckshot Roulette
description: Do you dare to bet your life on an exciting roulette wheel showdown? Buckshot Roulette is a gun simulator that combines strategy, shooting and survival. Instead of a pistol, a powerful shotgun was used. Every pull of the trigger is a choice of fate. The winner lives, the loser dies. You will begin a Turn-Based shooting roulette game. Each round will have a fixed number of bullets and blanks.

title: Octopus Invasion
description: Dive into the ocean and control a hungry octopus on its journey to become the ultimate sea predator! Hunt fish, evolve new abilities, and unlock deeper, more dangerous zones in this addictive underwater adventure.

title: Cityquest
description: Guess the hidden city by using compass directions and unlocking helpful hints like continent, flag, time zone, and name clues.

title: 10K
description: You start with 10,000 points and a blank map. Your objective is to retain the highest number of points by pinpointing five cities on the blank map.

title: Memoji
description: Match pairs of emojis and word cards to uncover and learn about a significant historical event from around the world each day.

title: Brilliant Jewels
description: Brilliant Jewels is a Match 3 game where you can either play against the time or try to pass levels with limited amount of moves. If you are feeling confident, you can also challenge the hard mode on the time attack mode. This game doesn't lack any sparkle!

title: FRAGEN
description:
FRAGEN offers intense gunfights and challenges! With dynamic game modes, you can test your skills in different ways and become the best shooter out there!
Are you ready to join the fight? Gear up, and prove your skills!

title: Chicken Scream Race
description: Get ready for a wacky and challenging voice-controlled adventure in Chicken Scream Race! This unique game brings a hilarious twist to platform racing by letting you control your character with both taps and your voice. Whether you’re clucking quietly or screaming loudly, your chicken responds to the intensity of your sound, making each race a chaotic yet exciting experience.

title: Italian Brainrot Tung Tung Racing
description: Italian Brainrot Tung Tung Racing is a hyper-chaotic, turbo-charged racing game where logic goes to die and only the wildest survive. In a world where speed meets absurdity, you’ll choose from a trio of outrageous racers, strap into your customized Formula car, and blast through tracks so insane they might just melt your brain. This isn’t your average kart racer—this is pure, high-octane brainrot.

title: Stickman Jump
description: stickman run at full speed, control stickman jump to avoid direct collision. complete each challenging and difficult level

title: Offroad Climb 4x4
description:
Welcome to "Offroad Climb 4x4", where the hills are alive with the roar of engines! This isn't just a game; it's an off-road odyssey. Imagine climbing up hills, navigating through a scrapyard of cars, scaling rocky terrains, and conquering snow-laden paths.

Whether you're a hardcore off-road enthusiast or just looking for some casual hill-climbing fun, "Offroad Climb 4x4" has something for everyone. So, buckle up, start your engines, and let the off-road adventure begin!

title: Plane Chase
description:
Ever watched a plane soar across the blue sky and thought, 'Hey, I could catch that… in my car!'? Well, your oddly specific and gravity-defying dreams are about to come true in 'Plane Chase'!

Fasten your seatbelts, rev the engine, and remember: it's not car theft if you're aiming for the plane! Are you ready for takeoff in the wackiest chase ever? Download 'Plane Chase' and steer your way through this high-flying, tire-screeching adventure. The skies are literally not the limit!

title: Spider Solitaire
description:
Challenge yourself with this captivating solitaire inspired by the classic Spider card game!

Arrange all the cards on the table into complete sequences of the same suit (from King to Ace), testing your logic, strategy, and patience.

Choose your difficulty level, play with one, two, or all four suits, and prove your skills with the deck.

Every move counts—can you complete all the sequences before running out of options?

title: Ragdoll Mania
description: Step into the world of Ragdoll mania : Mini games, where fun games meet ragdoll games! This is the ultimate experience for anyone looking to combine funny games with stress relief games

title: Zig Snake
description: Zig Snake is a fast-paced arcade game where your snake zigzags forward nonstop! It's the ultimate test of your reaction speed, focus, and timing. Dive into this retro-style snake game, challenge yourself, and try to beat your high score!

title: Aventador Vice Crime City
description: Dive into city driving with four game modes. Navigate realistic traffic and monitor your fuel while exploring busy streets. Enjoy stunning morning city graphics, transforming the city into a spectacle. Pedestrians add unpredictability, and hitting them triggers police chases. Customize your car's appearance and performance. All this chaos is accompanied by your cute dog. Whether evading the cops or just cruising, Aventador Vice Crime City offers a thrilling and visually amazing experience.

title: Zen Master - 3 tiles
description:
You can test your skills in this addictive puzzle game without time or place constraints. If you like solving problems like Match 3, Sudoku or Mahjong, then you will definitely like this game.

Collect three identical tiles to clear the board. Your goal is to completely clear the board of a variety of picture tiles. The levels start out easy and relaxing, but gradually become more challenging and addictive!

title: Lollipop Stack Run
description: Dive into a sweet adventure in Lollipop Stack Run which is a colorful parkour game! In this fun arcade game, keep running while collecting vibrant lollipops to stack your sweet tower. You need to be flexible and glide between various obstacles, making sure to collect as many lollipops as possible during the run.

title: Physics Balls
description: Physics Balls is a creative and challenging math and physics puzzle game. Here has numbers and ball elements. Improve your logical thinking and hands-on skills while having fun. Your aim is to break all bricks in one shoot. Throw balls to make them roll among the bricks. You can apply physical principles to control the balls cleverly.

title: Weapons and Ragdolls
description: Weapons and Ragdolls is an action-packed game featuring stickman characters and realistic physics. Use a wide range of weapons, from explosives to swords and firearms, while upgrading your arsenal to take on tougher challenges. Face diverse enemies, utilize slow-motion dodging, and enjoy randomly generated battles with increasing difficulty. Each fight offers a chance to refine your combat skills and try different strategies. Get ready for endless action and excitement!

title: One Line
description: One Line is a casual art drawing game where your mission is to use a single line to protect an innocent man from a series of unfortunate events. From shielding him against heavy rain to fending off aggressive bees and even angry giants, each level presents a new challenge. Get creative and use the power of One Line to ensure he stays safe, all while enjoying the simple yet satisfying drawing mechanics. The more you play, the more you'll need to think outside the box to keep him protected!

title: Brick Match
description: Brick Match is a fast, fun puzzle game! Tap to match colorful bricks, trigger combos, and beat brain-teasing levels. Use boosters like the Shuffle, Colour Bomb, Extra Moves, and Row Blaster to blast through tough spots. Can you clear the board and beat your high score?

title: Doge's Battle Royale
description: Want to join the most hilarious and action-packed survival shooting game ever? In Doge's Battle Royale, you take control of the legendary Doge. Battle on a battlefield full of guns, weapons, and crazy opponents. Defeat enemies and pick up their items. Strategize your moves, and shoot with precision to outlast your enemies in this intense Battle Royale challenge.

title: Pizza Tycoon
description: Play as Boss Hei Wa, running a pizza shop! Serve food, collect payments, hire and upgrade staff, and expand sales channels. Manage and grow your business to success!

title: Arcade Rope
description:
Swing between platforms in Arcade Rope! Play free and online in this rope-swinging adventure.
Arcade Rope is a fast-paced and addictive skill game where your goal is to swing from platform to platform using a rope. Perfectly time your swings to avoid falling into the abyss and see how far you can go. The gameplay is simple yet challenging, making it ideal for quick play sessions. Stay alert, react quickly, and master the art of swinging to survive longer.

title: Draw Weapon Fight Party
description: In Draw Weapon - Fight Party, you can draw your own weapons. Feel free to write your weapon, but keep an eye on the amount of ink left. Your creativity determines your combat style. Enter the 3D battle arena and fight against other opponents in an action-packed showdown. Draw precisely, craft the ultimate weapon, and crush your opponents to become the ultimate warrior.

title: Capybara Suika
description:
Capybara Suika is a fun and relaxing food merge puzzle game starring adorable capybaras!
Inspired by the viral Suika Game, drop and merge food to grow bigger and score higher.
With colorful visuals, cozy vibes, and a tiny game size, it’s the perfect lite game to enjoy anytime!

title: 2048 Merge Circle
description: 2048 Merge Circle is a fun and addictive number puzzle game with a twist! Rotate the circle, aim carefully, and shoot numbered balls to merge them. Combine matching numbers to upgrade them until you reach the ultimate goal—2048! It's a fresh take on the classic 2048 game with smooth mechanics and satisfying merges. Great for fans of casual games, brain teasers, and relaxing challenges.

title: Robby: Bomberman
description:
Dive into an exciting adventure with Robby, a brave hero who finds himself trapped in a labyrinth filled with ghosts and mysterious loot boxes. In this danger-filled world, to unlock the exit, Robby must defeat all the ghosts and destroy the crates, which may contain precious coins and useful bonuses.

But Robby is not alone in his fight! He has a loyal ally—a magical mushroom that can emerge from the loot boxes to assist him in battles against the ghosts.

title: Two Archers: Bow Duel
description: Get ready for a great battle at the Archery Tournament, because no one is going to just give up and let you win. With each new battle, your enemies will only become stronger. But you shouldn't stay put either. Buy new equipment. A huge selection of different bows will help you defeat your enemies, from simple wooden ones to magical golden bows with incendiary arrows! Earn money by participating in the tournament.

title: Room Sort Floor Plan
description: Room Sort Floor Plan is a fun creative puzzle game with elements of sorting and design. In this casual game, you’ll go through proper sorting and organization. Designing the perfect layout for every room. Rearrange the floor plan to create your unique home. Each level is a jigsaw puzzle challenge.

title: Idle Landmark Builder
description: Enjoy a casual idle simulation management game in the Idle Landmark - Builder. Here, you'll play the role of a construction tycoon and build world-famous landmarks from scratch. Manage workers to increase speed or your income, hire more workers and build your own construction empire. Build world-famous landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower and the Pyramids, and witness the entire process of their construction.

title: Donne's Spinning World
description:
In this 2D puzzle-platformer, you can spin the entire world using magical leaves. Rotating the world changes gravity and helps you reach new paths.

The goal is to collect all the flowers in each level.
Along the way, you'll need to push boxes, open doors, and avoid spikes and silly monsters.

Jump, rotate, and solve puzzles in a colorful world full of fun challenges!

title: Find Objects - Hidden Item
description:
Find objects on colorful maps with links and Easter eggs!
An interesting puzzle casual indie game in the genres of "Hidden Objects" and "Find the Differences"!

Embark on an exciting journey through beautiful 2D locations, where hundreds of hidden objects and riddles await you! Explore picturesque landscapes, mysterious cities and magical worlds to find all the hidden objects. And in the "Spot the Difference" mode, test your attentiveness by comparing two almost identical pictures!

title: Mahjong Connect Majong Class
description: Mahjong Connect is a classic elimination-style casual game where players need to find and connect identical mahjong tiles on the board. The game rules are simple yet challenging, suitable for players of all ages.

title: Stickman Guys Defense
description:
Stickman Guys Defense is an action-packed tower defense game where you must protect your base from endless waves of enemies! Command a team of brave stickman warriors, place them strategically, and upgrade their abilities to stop the invasion. From archers to sword fighters, build the ultimate defense and survive each level!

Can you defend your land and become the ultimate Stickman commander?

title: Fashion Famous
description: Step into the stylish universe of Fashion Famous! Compete in glamorous fashion contests, pick outfits that match each round’s theme, and impress the judges to earn high scores. Travel across global fashion capitals and showcase your look on dazzling runways. Explore makeup, hairstyles, and accessories to build the perfect outfit. Will your sense of style stand out among players from all around the world?

title: Garden Guardians
description:
A fun and strategic tower defense game that’s easy to pick up!
Tap directional arrows to launch seeds into flowerpots—each seed blossoms into a powerful flower ready to blast incoming zombies. Plan your moves, hold the line, and protect your garden from the undead horde!

title: Agents io
description:
Play Agents.io online! Eliminate other agents, grow your team, and dominate the arena in this free game.
Agents.io is a multiplayer action game where you control a lone agent and battle against others in an open arena. As you eliminate enemies, they join your team, allowing you to grow your squad and become stronger. The more agents you collect, the easier it is to dominate your opponents. Use smart tactics, avoid bigger squads, and climb to the top of the leaderboard!

title: Tap Block Puzzle: Smash Game
description:
Tap Block Puzzle: Smash Game is a satisfying and addictive puzzle game where you tap on two or more matching blocks to smash them!
? Clear the board, create massive combos, and reach high scores in this colorful, fun-packed block smashing experience.
Perfect for casual players and puzzle lovers alike!

title: Survival Racing: Extreme Road
description:
Imagine that the time has come when ordinary racing is no longer enough adrenaline temptation. In a world where extreme sports are at the peak of popularity, a new competition has appeared - Survival Racing: Extreme Road.

Overcome obstacles, avoid traps and fight your rivals to reach the finish line first. Your goal is not only to win the race, but also to survive in the face of fierce competition.

title: Ocean Small Hospital Doctor
description: Dive into the exciting world of Ocean Small Hospital - Doctor! This casual and educational game is an absolute blast for animal lovers. In this game, you'll step into the role of a heroic doctor on a submarine-turned-hospital. Your mission? Rescue injured sea animals from the vast ocean depths. As you spot a distressed creature, quickly assemble your medical team and gear.

title: Smash the Car to Pieces!
description: Shoot the car with guns. Launch a combat drone or summon a tornado. Ram the car with a giant hammer or blow up all the windows with dynamite. There are many ways to destroy a car waiting for you in this game.

title: Find It Out Colorful Book
description: Begin a challenging yet relaxing casual game in Find It Out Colorful Book. It brings you into a colorful world. You will begin an adventure to find hidden objects. Choose your favorite mode like beach, city, zoo, etc. Each page is filled with color and mysterious numbers waiting to be discovered and unlocked.

title: SORTSTORE
description: Swap products to match three of the same kind and fulfill customer requests. Products can be moved to empty shelves, and items in the back will move forward when the front ones are removed. Each move decreases the number of moves left, and the game ends when the move count reaches 0.

title: Fashion Challenge: Catwalk Run
description: Fashion Challenge: Catwalk Run is a stylish dress-up game where you join glamorous catwalk competitions. Pick the perfect outfit, match accessories, style your hair, and impress the judges. Travel to fashion shows around the world, earn points, unlock outfits, and become a global trendsetter. Win challenges to climb the leaderboard and prove your fashion sense. Every level brings a new style theme to conquer!

title: Italian Brainrot Jigsaw
description: Italian Brainrot Jigsaw is a funny puzzle game with the most popular meme characters. You can select one of the fifteen images and then select one of the four modes (16, 36, 64 and 100 pieces). Select your favorite picture and complete the jigsaw in the shortest time possible! Have fun and enjoy!

title: Dino Hide N Shoot
description: Do you want to begin a fun dinosaur-themed shooting game in Dino Hide N Shoot? Play a brave gunman on an exciting adventure! In this game, you will constantly run to avoid the attack of dinosaurs.And pick up the bullets, accumulate enough firepower. Pay attention to using the box as cover,seize the moment to shoot at the dinosaur! The gameplay is simple yet challenging.

title: Digger Fighter in the Maze
description: Digger Fighter in the Maze is an action-packed adventure game that takes you deep into a mysterious underground labyrinth filled with secrets, dangers, and treasures. Step into the shoes of a brave digger fighter as you tunnel your way through winding mazes, uncover hidden paths, and gather valuable resources. Along the way, you'll meet and recruit powerful allies, each with unique abilities that can help you overcome obstacles and defeat fierce enemies.

title: Idle Bathroom Empire Tycoon
description: Ready to become the ultimate bathroom tycoon? In this exciting mix of simulation, management, and idle tycoon gameplay, you’ll start with a small restroom. Grow it into a luxurious five-star hygiene haven! Upgrade facilities, optimize services, and expand your empire to make your bathroom the most popular spot in town. Manage your front desk with care, and faster cashiering will give you more cash flow.

title: Tung Tung Sahur: Obby Challenge
description: Jump into the viral madness of Tung Tung Sahur: Obby Challenge — a hilarious meme-based platformer where you dodge traps, jump across chaos, and try to survive with style.
