Inspired by trending TikTok memes, especially the absurd world of Italian Brainrot Animals. Play as the one and only meme legend, Tung Tung Sahur, and conquer chaotic Obby parkour levels like never before.

title: Mr Disc: Slingshot Strike
description:
Mr Disc is here to strike! Swipe, aim, and throw powerful discs to smash enemies, break obstacles, and clear every level in style.
Easy to play, hard to master – can you become the ultimate Slingshot Striker?

title: Match Masters
description: Match Masters is a real-time multiplayer match-3 puzzle game where players compete head-to-head on the same board. Each move requires strategic thinking, as it can benefit both you and your opponent. Utilize unique boosters, participate in tournaments, and climb the global leaderboards in this dynamic and engaging game.

title: Horror Playtime Room Escape
description: Challenge your brain to break through the fog of horror. In Horror Playtime - Room Escape you will enter a mysterious story. You spend your birthday with Ye Chen on the roof of a building. The strange woman suddenly appeared and trapped you in a horrible room. Enter many rooms full of puzzles and horror! Use your brain to solve hidden things and uncover the truth of horror stories. Every detail in the room is full of mystery.

title: Save the Daddy
description:
Get ready to unlock a world of tricky puzzles and brain teasers in Save the Daddy. Each level is unique and carefully designed to challenge your mind and test your IQ. Pull the pin in the right order and help the man escape from dangerous monsters & obstacles safely and thoughtfully.
Play each level very cautiously by analyzing your move before pulling the pin. As you progress, levels increase in difficulty which will make you game challenging and earn more rewards.

title: Get To The Chopper
description: Gear up and fight your way to safety in Get To The Chopper, a thrilling 3D first-person shooter where every mission is a battle for survival! Your objective is clear: reach the extraction chopper while eliminating all enemies standing in your way. Armed with a fully customizable loadout—including a primary gun, secondary weapon, grenades, and a melee weapon—you’ll face waves of enemies across dynamic battlefields such as forests, deserts, and more.

title: Candy Pop Mania
description:
Dive into the enchanting world of matching games - Candy Pop Mania - where delightful fun and challenging games await! Pop, blast and match 3 sweets to keep on the adventure! Use combos and reach the best results!
Challenge yourself to win all of the levels of Candy Pop Mania!

title: Klondike Solitaire
description:
Test your skill and logic with Klondike, the classic solitaire game loved by generations!

Stack the cards in ascending order, alternating colors, and complete all four suits to win the game.

With clean graphics, intuitive controls, and the option to play with one or three cards, Klondike offers hours of fun and relaxation.

Perfect for a quick break or a long strategic challenge!

title: Butterfly Kyodai Rainbow
description: Play Butterfly Kyodai Rainbow – a relaxing and colorful butterfly-matching puzzle game with fresh mechanics and vibrant rainbow visuals! Enjoy hundreds of exciting levels, earn daily rewards, take part in special events, and unlock beautiful new wings. A fun Mahjong-style connect game for all ages – no download required!

title: Royal Garden Match
description: Welcome to Royal Garden Match! You’ve inherited a grand Royal Castle and a once-beautiful garden—now it’s up to you to bring its beauty to life! Solve exciting match-3 puzzles by combining exquisite royal flowers, fruits, and plants to unlock powerful boosters. With hundreds of challenging levels, unique royal characters, and a magical journey ahead, there's always something new to discover. Can you make the royal garden flourish? Play now and start your enchanting adventure!

title: Hole Digger
description: Grab your shovel and start your journey deep into the earth. Mine valuable resources, upgrade your tools, level up your skills, and unlock new opportunities for even faster digging. The deeper you dig, the richer the treasures. Can you reach the very bottom?

title: Container Sort Puzzle
description:
Container Sort Puzzle - Sort All the Cargo!
Get ready to test your brain with Container Sort Puzzle, the ultimate cargo-sorting challenge! Load the right containers onto the right ships and become a port master!
Perfect for fans of sort games, stacking puzzles, and logic-based challenges. Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned puzzler, Container Sort Puzzle will keep your brain sharp and entertained.

title: Fruit Mahjong 3D
description: Fruit Mahjong 3D is a relaxing puzzle game where you match pairs of fruit-themed tiles in 3D space. Rotate the view, find free tiles, and clear the board by matching identical pieces. Each level is handcrafted and fully solvable, offering a mix of easy and challenging layouts. The game starts with a short tutorial and gradually increases in difficulty. Use shuffle and hint buttons if you get stuck. Enjoy colorful graphics, smooth animations, and intuitive controls on both mobile and desktop.

title: Single Stroke: Energy Line Puzzle
description: Single Stroke: Energy Line Puzzle is a fun and simple way to train your brain every day. This mind-challenging game has easy rules—just connect all the circles using a single continuous line. It’s a great way to keep your brain sharp with quick, clever puzzles. Spend just a few minutes daily to give your mind a boost. Enjoy this brain-training experience anytime, anywhere!

title: Geometry Dash Jump
description: Get ready for an electrifying challenge in Geometry Dash Jump Test your reflexes and timing as you jump, fly, and dash through neon-lit obstacles in a world of glowing geometry. With fast-paced action, rhythmic music, and intense gameplay, this game will push your skills to the limit!

title: Ballistic Breakthrough
description: explore lush scenes, tackle tricky obstacles, and unlock upgrades. Every level blends fun challenges with strategic boosts

title: Perfect Cake Maker
description: Get ready to make some seriously delicious cakes in Perfect Cake Maker! It’s a delightful casual simulation game. When you start, you’ll see a fully stocked kitchen and delicious guests waiting. First, choose the cake base based on your guests’ needs. Then comes the fun part – mixing the ingredients!

title: Italian Brainrot: Puzzle & Battle
description:
You have many parts of the same picture. Drag and drop the parts and assemble the character picture.

A game about Italian animal characters. Each level is a new character.

Unlock them all!

title: LOL Funny Dance
description: LOL Funny Dance is a hilarious 2D game where you can distort the faces of politicians and celebrities to create the funniest expressions! Drag and move different points on the image to stretch, twist, and transform their looks into ridiculous and exaggerated versions. Watch them dance and react as you manipulate their faces in real time. Play the LOL Funny Dance game now.

title: Sudoku Master
description: Sudoku by in8finity is a classic puzzle game with a sleek dark theme, offering a smooth and enjoyable experience. Flexible settings let you adjust the difficulty to match your skill level. With intuitive controls and eye-friendly visuals, you can focus on solving puzzles without distractions. More than just a game, Sudoku trains logic, concentration, and memory. Challenge yourself and enjoy relaxing, distraction-free gameplay!

title: Bolts
description:
Test your logic and strategy in this unique puzzle game. Solve intricate challenges by unscrewing bolts in the right order—every move counts.

Features:
Unique Levels – Each puzzle offers a fresh challenge.

Strategic Gameplay – The sequence of moves is key.

Engaging Puzzles – Designed to push your problem-solving skills.

Every detail matters. Can you master the mechanics?

title: Animal Sort - Cute Puzzle Game
description:
Are you a pet person? Do you wanna run a farm that is full of cute animals? Try Animal Sort, not only be an owner but also be in charge of keeping them in line - the game you should not look away.

This is not just a regular puzzle game, but it's also a fantastic one with a lot of mini games included. Moreover, we have an additional mode of building the pet city that you definitely won't be able to miss. Let's give it a try!

title: Clinic Cleanup Crew
description:
Players play the role of cleaners in the health center in the game. They are responsible for the cleaning and sanitation work in all areas within the health center, keeping the environment of the health center clean and hygienic and providing a good environment for clients.
The game features a fresh and lovely art style, with the details of characters and buildings depicted vividly, bringing players a healing visual enjoyment.

title: Shoot N Crush
description: Unleash your shooting skills and break bricks in Shoot N Crush. This game is the best choice for your leisure time. Your goal is to shoot with precision and flexibility. Use the bouncing ball to smash a solid brick with precision. Each level has a different objective and difficulty, you need to break these bricks in the smartest way possible.

title: Smoke Trail
description:
Drift and earn in this fast-paced 2D endless drifting game!
Master the art of controlled slides across an ever-changing track. Rack up cash by chaining stylish drifts and maintaining momentum—then use your earnings to unlock a growing collection of iconic drift cars, each with its own unique stats and feel. But it’s not just about the money—complete challenges to test your skill, and unlock a special car.

Easy to pick up, hard to master—how far can you go before you crash?

title: Potion Merge Witch
description:
Combine magical potions to create bigger ones! Potion Merge Witch brings you a relaxing and magical merging experience. Can you create the ultimate potion? Try it now!

- Combine identical potions to create new, bigger ones.
- Use three special buttons:  shake the cauldron, remove a potion or upgrade potions to speed up merging.

Help the witch craft the biggest and most powerful potion ever!

title: Alien Intelligence Test
description: You've been abducted. To prove you're intelligent, aliens test you with strange puzzles and machines. Push buttons, solve challenges, survive the test.

title: Italian Brainrot: Neuro Beasts
description:
Welcome to the world of Italian Neuro-Animals!
This is a clicker game featuring bizarre creatures generated by neural networks — get ready for chaos, memes, and pizza.

Collect them all! Level up like crazy! And may the Neuro-Pizza be with you

title: TB Avataria Life Girl
description:
Hey, how about helping me decorate my house? You need to decorate my home beautifully, buy me nice clothes, and feed me. Let's get started — right now, I have an empty house, and we need to furnish it together. Let's make it look organized and cozy! Before I get too hungry, you must take me to the café to eat, or I might lose my life from hunger!
We also need to earn money. To make money, reach the computer and use the money-making app. You can either buy things or continue earning more money!

title: The White Room 5
description: The White Room 5 is the fifth sequel of an adventure escape game with a cartoon art style. Find objects that can help you escape the room and use your logic to solve the puzzles. Good luck!

title: BlowUp ATM
description: BlowUp ATM – The ultimate heist action game where you become a master thief! Your mission? Plant explosives, blow up ATMs, and grab as much cash as you can before escaping! But beware – the cops are always on high alert!

title: Sudoku Guru - classic sudoku
description:
Develop your logic and train your brain in "Sudoku Guru - Classic Sudoku"!
Enjoy Sudoku, solve daily challenges and get trophies for completing tasks.

There are 5 different difficulty levels available to you: easy, medium, difficult, expert and guru. Each level is a unique puzzle.
Track your progress and challenge yourself with the statistics report. This feature adds a competitive element to the game, motivating you to become a real guru.

title: Puzzle Lab
description: Tap connected blocks to clear them! If any blocks are left, you will lose life. The game ends when your life reaches 0. You can use placed special bombs by tapping them.

title: Dictator Simulator: 1984
description: Make choices as the Supreme Leader of a dystopian state. Maintain control, balance resources, and crush opposition—or be overthrown!

title: Troll The Teacher
description:
Laugh and prank the teacher in this fun school game!

Have you ever dreamed of playing a prank on your teacher? Now you have a chance! In this game, you will become a student who arranges funny pranks right during the lesson. Use the most unexpected "tools", upgrade them and watch the funny reactions of the teacher!

title: Toy Claw Simulator
description: Toy Claw Simulator is a fun and addictive arcade game where you take control of a virtual claw machine to collect a wide variety of adorable toys! Carefully aim and time your claw to grab plushies, action figures, and surprise collectibles. Once you've stocked up your toy inventory, head over to the factory to sell them for shiny coins! Use your earnings to run the machine to use the crane to unlock new toys. It's a charming blend of skill, strategy, and rewarding progression!

title: Swordsman Adventure
description: Swordsman Adventure is a thrilling adventure game where you wield your sword freely on the battlefield to complete a series of missions. In this role-playing game, you control your soldier to attack enemies of different hit points. You get rewards at the end of each mission completed, which you can use to upgrade your attack points or to equip with a new weapon.

title: Hunting underwater spearfishing
description:
Hunting underwater spearfishing – a realistic diving adventure!

Dive into underwater exploration as a diver in a wetsuit, hunting with scuba gear. Explore lakes, seas, and oceans, encounter 30+ marine species, and marvel at coral reefs. Freediving, underwater hunting, and treasure searches await! Upgrade harpoons, masks, and tanks, battle predators, and survive hostile depths. Discover new locations and earn rewards to improve with every dive!

title: Single Line Puzzle Drawing
description:
Sharpen your mind each day with fun single-line drawing puzzles — clever, captivating brain teasers that boost your cognitive skills one stroke at a time. Enjoy a relaxing and rewarding 20-minute mental workout!
Would you like a version tailored for an app store description or marketing banner?

title: Resident Evil: Purge Operation
description: At the start of each level, players must quickly locate powerful weapons like the shotgun and sniper rifle, crucial for fending off hordes of zombies. Once the eerie alarm sounds, grotesque, ferocious undead flood the area. A single mistake can lead to being swarmed, so precise marksmanship, agile movement, and calm judgment are essential for survival.​

title: Tung Tung Sahur Coloring Book
description:
Unleash your creativity with the Italian Tung Coloring Book, a hilarious and surreal coloring experience inspired by the viral Italian Brainrot meme phenomenon. Featuring absurd characters like Tung Tung Tung Sahur, Tralalero Tralala, and Bombardiro Crocodilo, this coloring book offers a unique blend of humor and art.
Each page presents a bizarre and whimsical scene, inviting you to add your personal touch with colors.

title: Sprunki Space Challenge
description: Get ready to soar through the stars in Sprunki Space Challenge an intergalactic online adventure where brave kids take flight to save the galaxy. This wild space ride throws you into the cockpit of a zippy space rover where danger lurks in every asteroid and rocket burst. But worry not: Sprunki is here to lead the charge. It is all about timing, reflexes, and sky-high jumps that send you sailing straight into the action.

title: Ragdoll Beat - Simulator
description:
In "Ragdoll Beat - Simulator" you will find crazy levels, chaos physics and familiar characters! How far can you go, creating incredible moments with a ragdoll?

-Unique levels, where every object can become a tool of fun.
-Realistic ragdoll physics - push, throw and watch the result!
-The more you play, the more new situations you discover!

Jump into "Ragdoll Beat - Simulator" and check what chaos physics is capable of! Complete all the tests, open new opportunities and enjoy crazy fun!

title: Real Drive 3D
description:
Are you ready to experience unique car-driving gameplay? Start with your SUV and unlock new vehicles as you progress through the game, playing different and unique levels. Drive your favorite vehicles, and navigate your way around new challenging environments.

We welcome all racing car game fans to experience this new driving game! Real Drive 3D is a car simulation game which will give you a unique arcade experience.

title: Block Crasher
description: Block Crasher is a fun and fast-paced mix of classic Bubble Shooters, block-breaking games, and a bit of penalty shooting flair. Your goal is to launch colorful bubbles at moving blocks, match the colors, and score as many points as possible. It’s all about timing, precision, and quick thinking as the blocks keep shifting across the screen.

title: Ninja Spell Match
description: Ninja Spell Match is a fast-paced blend of match-3 puzzling and ninja action. Connect tiles to charge up your attacks and unleash devastating moves against waves of enemies. With each level, the challenge grows tougher as you fight your way through 30 unique stages packed with traps, puzzles, and rival ninjas. Think fast, match smart, and strike hard—your reflexes and strategy are the only way to survive.

title: Freecell Solitaire
description:
Put your mind to the test with FreeCell, one of the most beloved solitaire card games of all time!

Move cards between columns, use the free cells cleverly, and organize suits in ascending order to win.

Elegant graphics, smooth animations, and intuitive controls make every game a relaxing and satisfying experience.

Whether you're a solitaire veteran or a curious beginner, FreeCell will win you over with its perfect mix of simplicity and strategy.

title: 2048 Cube Merge
description: How far can your skills take you? Target, shoot and merge cubes while unlocking exciting upgrades and customizations. Enjoy captivating gameplay and stunning visuals with every move you make. The 2048 cube challenge begins now!

title: World Z Defense - Zombie Defense
description: Zombies have taken over the world! Unlock bases and deploy soldiers with unique weapons, each with stats like damage, fire rate, and reload speed. Soldiers must reload at the base before defending. Place them wisely to stop zombies within range. Defeat waves to earn coins, upgrade bases, and survive stronger hordes. Strategically choose soldiers to clear waves and save cities across the globe.

title: Greek Tower Stacker
description:
Build the tallest structure by stacking beautiful new floors. Each floor contains intricate pillars and arches reminiscent of the mighty Greek civilization.

Challenge yourself to create the most majestic tower in ancient history.

title: DayCare Tycoon
description: Are you ready to build your dream business empire and be a great babysitter in this money tycoon simulator ? Dive into the world of daycare games and experience the joy of managing your own thriving idle tycoon games. From welcoming adorable babies to creating a safe and happy environment, this game offers everything you need to grow your daycare business into a successful venture.

title: Serious Head 2
description:
The adventures of a serious head continue.
Portals open, monsters come out.
Prepare for battle: rebuild your base and upgrade your weapons.
Take your partners to help you and put up a decent resistance!

title: Candy Chain Master
description: Welcome to Candy Chain Master! The board has blue tiles with candies on them. Start by selecting a candy and move across nearby tiles with the same candy to make a chain of three or more. Each tile must turn golden by matching at least one candy on it. Think carefully and move fast to turn all tiles golden before time runs out.

title: Help The Duck
description:
Helping Little Duck
In this Skill Game help a charming little duckling to fall into the tub with water. Throw the water in the correct places so that the duckling falls directly into the tub. - Play Helping Little Duck Free and Enjoy!

title: Battle Simulator - Sandbox
description:
You can play against the provided levels or create your own battle.

Victory depends only on the best strategy! With the most accurate placement of your army, you will achieve the best results!

title: Fish Kingdom
description: Our game will show you in all the beauty of the real sea world. A world in which life is booming, because it is inhabited by sea creatures, mermaids, shells, plankton and many other amazing creatures of the sea world!

title: Stickboys Hook
description: Swing with Stickboys and jump your way to the finish line. Stickboys needs your help. Assist him and reach the goal! Jump from launch ramps and shoot webs to get to the end. You must complete every level. Be careful — if you fall from the sky, you lose the game.

title: Wacky Wheels
description:
? Wacky Wheels – Drift, Dodge & Dominate!
Master the chaos in Wacky Wheels, the ultimate test of timing and control!
Navigate wild tracks, drift through tight turns, dodge massive hammers, and collect stars — all before the clock runs out. Each level brings new challenges, themes, and physics that’ll keep you on the edge of your seat.

? It’s not just a race — it’s a wacky adventure of skill and speed!

title: Push To Go
description:
Push to Go – A Fun & Addictive Puzzle Adventure!
Get ready for an exciting brain-teasing experience with Push to Go, a 2D puzzle platformer built in Unity! Perfect for fans of logic games, button-based mechanics, and minimalist brain challenges, this game will test your timing, planning, and puzzle-solving skills.

title: Cloak Master Shooter Run
description: Cloak Master-Shooter Run allows you to show your shooting and running skills in an exciting environment! In this casual game, you will be transformed into a mysterious hero. Navigate through different scenarios, avoid obstacles and complete challenges.

title: Panda Kitchen Idle Tycoon
description: Want to become the best restaurant tycoon? You’ll build your own panda-themed food empire in Panda Kitchen: Idle Tycoon. Earn idle profits, and manage your way to success. Unlock new dining tables and kitchen equipment to improve efficiency. Recruiting chefs and servers to create an ultra-efficient restaurant team.

title: Noob Ragdoll: Crazy Punch
description:
In "Noob Ragdoll: Crazy Punch", you'll see the world from a unique perspective - through the eyes of the glove itself! 

What Awaits You:
-First-person camera - Feel like you're delivering the punch yourself!
-Minecraft-style characters and vibrant action-packed scenes
-Epic punches and spectacular body launches on every level
-Multiple glove skins - choose yours and strike with style!

Test your accuracy and style in "Noob Ragdoll: Crazy Punch" - ragdoll physics has never been this dynamic!

title: Just Ludo
description: Just Ludo is a tabletop dice board game. Roll the dice and let your chess pieces reach the finish line first, so as to defeat the opponent and win rich rewards. Are you ready for the challenge?

title: Happy Color
description:
Happy Color – Smash Bricks & Relax! ?

Are you ready for the most satisfying brick-smashing experience? Grab your colorful hammer and start breaking tiles in Happy Color! This fun and relaxing game will take you on a journey through vibrant levels filled with exciting challenges. Smash, break, and clear the board in a visually stunning environment designed to keep you entertained for hours!

title: Nonogram Master
description:
Nonogram Master is an exciting puzzle game based on Japanese crosswords. Solve hidden pixel pictures using numbers as clues!

Choose a comfortable control method:
PC — Left-click to fill a square, right-click to mark with an "X".
Mobile — Tap control: select a mode and tap a cell.

Customize the game, train your logic, and enjoy the process! Are you ready to become a Nonogram Master?

title: Deadly Parkour
description:
Dynamic Duo:
Take control of two distinct characters, each with their own strengths and abilities. 

Precision Platforming:
Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of precision platforming, where every jump matters. Test your reflexes and hone your skills as you traverse 70 meticulously hand crafted levels.

title: Sandbox Island War
description: Get ready for a wonderful pixel battle in Pixel Island War! This strategy game brings you to a wonderful pixel world. Here your task is to conquer islands and expand your empire. Build bases, gather resources and prepare for fierce battles on different islands. For example, choose an island to place humans on. Humans will build towns and multiply. Choose sheep to produce wool and meat.

title: Sprunky Incredibox Mods
description:
How many sprunki can you imagine in one game? What if they are all collected together?!
In "Sprunki Incredibox Mods" you will have access to:

-10 different mods for your sprunki
-200 sprunki skins for your favorite characters
-Unique sounds for special sprunki
-Many places for your unique group

Click play and find out what other characters are waiting for you in the game "Sprunki Incredibox Mods"!

title: The White Room 4
description: The White Room 4 is an immersive escape game that challenges your logic and problem-solving skills. Find yourself trapped in a hotel room and embark on a thrilling adventure to escape. Utilize the tools at your disposal, solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and crack passwords to unlock your path to freedom. Will you be able to conquer the puzzles and break free from this challenging escape experience?

title: Rope Color Sort 3D
description: Rope Color Sort 3D is a creative puzzle game where players need to skillfully sort colorful ropes into their corresponding tubes. The game features beautiful 3D graphics and smooth physics effects, providing players with a relaxing and enjoyable gaming experience.

title: Super Slime
description: Super Slime is a fast-paced platformer where you take control of a squishy, bouncy hero on a mission to save the day. Master the art of stretching, bouncing, and dodging through 100 thrilling levels packed with tricky obstacles and fierce enemies. Precision and quick reflexes are your best allies in this adorable yet challenging adventure!

title: Number Master
description:
A number elimination game, connect two numbers that are the same or add up to 10, eliminate them!Relax and match in a peaceful bamboo forest. 

If you enjoy logic puzzles like Sudoku, Merge Numbers, Ten Match, or CrossMath, Panda Match Ten is your perfect nature escape. Train your brain, improve your memory, and boost logic—all with the charm of adorable pandas and soothing bamboo forests.

title: Park Them All!
description:
Park Them All! – The Ultimate Parking Puzzle Challenge! 

Are you ready to put your parking skills to the test? In Park Them All!, your goal is to park every car correctly without crashing! Solve tricky parking puzzles, avoid obstacles, and maneuver through tight spaces to complete each level. The challenge gets harder as more cars enter the scene! Can you park them all?

title: Mahjong Connect Fish World
description: Mahjong Connect Fish World is a captivating puzzle game with an ocean theme. In this beautiful underwater world, players need to connect matching mahjong tiles to eliminate them, unlock levels, and explore a rich variety of marine creatures. The game combines traditional connect-style gameplay with an ocean theme, providing players with a relaxing and enjoyable gaming experience.

title: Candy Match Puzzle
description:
Dive into a delightful puzzle experience with Candy Puzzle Match, where matching candies is all about tapping! Simply tap on groups of two or more adjacent candies of the same color to clear them from the board. The more candies you clear at once, the higher your score!

Watch the board shift and cascade with every move as you complete deliciously fun objectives. With colorful visuals and satisfying chain reactions, this game is perfect for fans of casual and relaxing puzzle games.

title: Hoop Rivals
description: Hoop Rivals flips the court on its head! In this fast-paced arcade battler, you are the hoop—spinning, bouncing, and racing to catch the ball before your rivals do. Face off against up to 5 players in chaotic, high-flying matches where only the fastest hoop wins!

title: Giant Wanted Monster
description: The city is being occupied by giant monsters. You, as an elite sniper, pick up your sniper gun. Defeat these crazy monsters and protect the survival of humanity. In Giant Wanted Monster, the fate of the city is at stake with every bullet. You need to use the powerful sniper weapon to shoot accurately from a distance and hit the monster's Achilles heel.

title: Impostor Among Space
description: Impostor Among Space is a thrilling single-player stealth game where you play as the Impostor aboard a spaceship full of unsuspecting AI crewmates. Your mission? Eliminate them one by one, sabotage critical systems, and avoid detection at all costs.

title: Tap Car
description:
Unveil stunning car masterpieces by solving image puzzles. Every tap reveals more of the picture—can you uncover them all? A must-play for car enthusiasts and puzzle lovers alike!

Would you like a few more variations depending on the tone you're aiming for (like more casual, exciting, or elegant)?

title: Jewel Dress Up
description: Each puzzle brings you closer to unlocking fabulous fashionable combinations. Use power-ups to overcome challenges and to express your style, all while enjoying a relaxing and engaging gameplay. Can you create the perfect look?

title: Pirate Paradise
description: Pirate Paradise is a fun and relaxing game where you have to match three identical items in a row. Help the pirates sort the items into portals. The difficulty of the game will gradually increase and there will be more and more items.

title: Robot Runner Fight
description: Are you ready for a robotic parkour adventure? Robots run and fight on high-speed parkour platforms!  Youll control a flexible robot that travels through the city of the future. Avoid obstacles, fight enemies, and race to the finish line.

title: Home Design - Match 3
description: Enjoy a perfect blend of home design and match-3 fun! Solve colorful puzzles, create your ideal home, and activate powerful boosters. Take on rewarding challenges, collect prizes, and personalize your interiors. Play anytime, anywhere!

title: HeroBall Adventures 2
description: It’s time to embark on a brand new adventure in this great game, this time in a spherical theme! Heroball Adventures 2 is finally here! It’s a fun game where heroball has to save his friends who were abducted by a strange machine on an otherwise calm day. Control the character, jump over obstacles and try to save all of your friends. Be sure to try to get to the end of each level. Collect points and unlock new abilities!

title: Tower Defense
description: In Tower Defense, you will direct a powerful army of defense towers to face enemy attacks. Arrange your defense towers carefully and develop the strategy to repel the enemy. Each tower has different attack powers and abilities. Unlock the right type and placement. Update your soldiers to help you battle. Use your crossbow to take them out.

title: Cooking Cafe Food Chef
description:
Prepare and cook delicious food from all over the world in Cooking Cafe Story. Build the cafe of your dreams while serving hot meals to hungry customers at a fast pace! Don't let the time run out, practice your time management skills, and experience the craze of real cooking!

Dash from cafe's to restaurants and unlock many locations as your progress on your journey. This cooking game offers endless fun levels with challenging missions set up in each level to give you that special experience!

title: Uphill Rush 13
description: Introducing the new, thirteenth game in the Uphill Rush series, and this time in a new setting - a Water Park! Dive into (pun intended) the atmosphere of water fun, riding different types of tubes, surfboards and even jet skis! Unlock new power-ups and skins by overcoming obstacles, such as loops and long jumps. But don't be scared of them, they are your best friends when it comes to stunts, which give you bonuses! Not to mention, make you look insanely cool.

title: How To Dress Your Dragon
description:
Create your collection dream dragon!

In "How to Dress Your Dragon", you can design and customize your very own adorable dragon. Choose from a wide variety of fun options, including wings, outfits, accessories, and even quirky headpieces like ice cream hats! Add stickers, pick vibrant colors, and create a dragon that’s as unique as you are.

Then take snapshots of your masterpiece and save or share it with your friends!

A magical and relaxing experience for dragon enthusiasts of all ages!

title: Lovie Chics Spring Break Fashion
description: Lovie Chics Spring Break Fashion” is your ultimate destination for chic and trendy outfits perfect for the spring break season! Explore our curated collection of vibrant dresses, stylish swimwear, and must-have accessories designed to elevate your style and make a statement wherever you go. Whether you’re hitting the beach, lounging by the pool, or exploring new destinations, we have everything you need to look and feel fabulous all spring break long.

title: Kawaii Claw Merge
description:
The cutest merging adventure has arrived, featuring some of the most colorful Kawaii plushies around! 

Show off your merging skills by combining smaller Kawaii plushies to get a bigger plushy! Can you discover the biggest plushy of them all?

Ready for a serious dose of cuteness?
Play Kawaii Merge now - and let the merging magic begin!

title: Fun IQ Puzzle
description: Fun IQ Puzzle is a vibrant and engaging logic game that test your problem-solving skills with colorful bubble-based puzzles. In Story Mode, we have to unlock locked spaces by placing colorful puzzles in the right spots. In Time Attack Mode, we have to race against the clock to solve puzzles as quick as possible. Challenge yourself to master every stage with this fun puzzle game!
